per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set. Defaults to no limit if left blank.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific ids.

hide_empty.description: If true, empty terms will not be returned.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set. Defaults to no limit if left blank.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

slug.description: Limit result set to products with specific slug(s). Use commas to separate.

after.description: Limit response to resources created after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

before.description: Limit response to resources created before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

date_column.description: When limiting response using after/before, which date column to compare against.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific ids.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

parent.description: Limit result set to those of particular parent IDs.

parent_exclude.description: Limit result set to all items except those of a particular parent ID.

type.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific type.

sku.description: Limit result set to products with specific SKU(s). Use commas to separate.

featured.description: Limit result set to featured products.

category.description: Limit result set to products assigned a set of category IDs or slugs, separated by commas.

category_operator.description: Operator to compare product category terms.

brand.description: Limit result set to products assigned a set of brand IDs or slugs, separated by commas.

brand_operator.description: Operator to compare product brand terms.

tag.description: Limit result set to products assigned a set of tag IDs or slugs, separated by commas.

on_sale.description: Limit result set to products on sale.

min_price.description: Limit result set to products based on a minimum price, provided using the smallest unit of the currency.

max_price.description: Limit result set to products based on a maximum price, provided using the smallest unit of the currency.

stock_status.description: Limit result set to products with specified stock status.

attributes.description: Limit result set to products with selected global attributes.

slug.description: List of attribute slug(s). If a term ID is provided, this will be ignored.

operator.description: Operator to compare product attribute terms.

attribute_relation.description: The logical relationship between attributes when filtering across multiple at once.

catalog_visibility.description: Determines if hidden or visible catalog products are shown.

rating.description: Limit result set to products with a certain average rating.

calculate_price_range.description: If true, calculates the minimum and maximum product prices for the collection.

calculate_stock_status_counts.description: If true, calculates stock counts for products in the collection.

calculate_attribute_counts.description: If requested, calculates attribute term counts for products in the collection.

query_type.description: Filter condition	 being performed which may affect counts. Valid values include "and" and "or".

calculate_rating_counts.description: If true, calculates rating counts for products in the collection.

calculate_taxonomy_counts.description: If requested, calculates taxonomy term counts for products in the collection.
